company_name: SGS Cosmetics & Personal Care - Regulatory Services
product_highlights: World's largest testing and certification company
Local expertise in every major market
key_benefits: Seamless integration of testing and regulatory
notes: SGS is the world's largest testing, inspection, and certification company with a presence in over 140 countries. Their Cosmetics & Personal Care division provides comprehensive regulatory consulting services seamlessly integrated with their global testing laboratories. This unique combination allows for efficient coordination between product testing and regulatory documentation, accelerating time to market. SGS offers particularly strong support for global market entry, with local regulatory expertise in every major cosmetic market including USA, EU, China, ASEAN, and Brazil. They are the preferred partner for large manufacturers and multinational brands requiring worldwide regulatory compliance.
